verses.text:
Holy Sabbath, sacred rest,
Welcome to each weary breast;
Cheering hour that points away
To eternity's bright day.

Ever since creation's birth,
Thou hast been to cheer the earth;
When the course of time began,
Thou wast made, and made for man.

While thou bring'st peaceful rest,
Man by thee is doubly blest;
Thou dost raise our thoughts to raise
To our great Creator's praise.

Thus drawn nearer to our Lord,
Hearts attained to sweet accord,
We shall hail the glorious day
When all flesh shall own his sway.
